website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you need a vacuum designed to clean carpets and hard flooring at a mid-range price.
pros: Has a brush roll that can be turned off for cleaning hard flooring
Swivel steering makes it easy to maneuver around objects
Large dirt cup allows you to do a lot of vacuuming before you have to empty it
Sealed allergen system keeps dirt and dust out of the air
Tools are made to remove pet hair
cons: Delivers impressive suction at first, but it tends to decrease with repeated use

website_summaries.verdict: A feature-packed vacuum that's designed with pet owners in mind and includes the tools to tackle pet hair on floors, furniture, and more.
pros: Works on carpet and hard flooring, thanks to the brush roll that can be turned on and off
Ample on-board tools for pet hair removal included
Spacious dirt cup and swivel steering cut down on time and work
cons: Faulty models that quit working after several months of use have been reported

customer_reviews.title: I’m amazed at how much hair it picks up
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed at how much hair it picks up! I have a German Shepherd, two cats and two very messy kids who leave crumbs and small pieces of garbage all over the place. This vacuum picks it all up. I never thought I’d love a vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and one big dog. This vacuum is very effective on cleaning carpets, hard floors and couches. The long cord is helpful. Easy assembly. Easy to empty. Had this vacuum for two weeks now. Hoping it will continue to perform.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I usually like to buy Hoover vacuums. But this one is different than the one I normally buy. I like the light on it. I like that it swivels. It is easy to empty. Easy cleaning of filters. But the way is you change the suction is a little different and you are not really sure if it is correct or not. Also you don't have to adjust to different carpet heights. It just does it. All and all it is not to bad so far. The price you pay for it. It better last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Like many of us I’ve purchased many vacuums over the ...
customer_reviews.text: Like many of us I’ve purchased many vacuums over the years. Brands such as kenmore ect and this is the first Hoover vacuum and I’m very happy with the suction and pickup. The filter is easy to clean and canister is easy to empty. This works great on dog hair and dog dander.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Horribly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! This is THE worst vacuum I've owned in 35 yrs. I bought this because I needed a vacuum that would work on tile. This has the ability to turn off the brush. When you do that, it only sucks dirt in a 2 inch path out of the 13 inch span of the front of the vacuum. This means you have to work 6x as much AND forget about even getting anywhere near the baseboards. I can go on and on about the lack of functionality this "WANNABE a vacuum" (any vacuum, pick one..its better than this one) does not handle. Do yourself a favor and buy a broom instead!!
customer_reviews.author: AZ 50 woman

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap vacuum with no settings
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to order this vacuum but I was very disappointed! It has no settings to change for the length of carpet (ex: hard wood, low carpet, very high fluffy carpet, etc.) and when I received the vacuum it was clearly already used and in an opened box. Came with dust already in the clear empty case!! Also, the handle does NOT lock on. so while you are vacuuming upright, it comes right off in your hands. I will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Katherinedekam

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Good worker for the money...at least as good as Dyson (had one; don't want another) I get clogs of course...I get clogs with EVERY vacuum cleaner because of the dogs. This one is much easier to take apart than the Dyson ever was. As for the overheating and shutting off...if it clogs it will overheat - they all do. If when it overheats it turns off (others DON'T) it saves the motor. I think that is a good thing. One star off because there is no onboard storage for one of the attachments (the one on the far right in the picture)
customer_reviews.author: NEK shopper

customer_reviews.title: Died within a year
customer_reviews.text: I live in an 850 square foot apartment and vacuumed about once a week, and yet it kept overheating and died completely today. While it did work well when it worked, and was easy to use and maintain, unfortunately it didn't survive for even a year. I'm back on the hunt for a new one...
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: One of the better vacuums I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the better vacuums I have ever used. Easy to dump canister, as well as easy to use wand extension. The cord is not as long as my old Hoover, but it is manageable. It is much lighter than my old Hoover and very maneuverable as well. It has great suction and picks up a lot of dog hair!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Superb product
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. Bought it for several reasons. Platform is a bit smaller which allows cleaning in smaller space. It picks up pet hair like a charm. The dirt it picks up is remarkable. The last vacuum we had was a Dyson. Would not advise that brand. Before the Dyson we had a sweeper with a bag which caused it to smell bad because of pet hair sitting in it. Love the rotation this machine achieves. Cannot say one bad thing about this product. Price was great also.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D Klenk

customer_reviews.title: Ummm
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because pretty sure I received a “refreshed” one or whatever they’re calling it when I paid full price for a brand new one. It didn’t come in a Hoover box like you’d see in a store or the way it should have come had it been new...it came in an all white box...will have to contact Amazon. The vacuum itself is extremely powerful not sure what all the bad reviews are about...had I received a new one I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: K_Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good vacuum cleaner so far
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good vacuum cleaner so far. Moves well, picks up a lot per sweep, has good reach and the pet attachment works well so far. We've not had a lot of luck with VC holding up but this one seems like it's up for the challenge!
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Died in just 4 months! Worst vaccum ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in September of 2018, it died January 2019. Used it once a week, worked great but lost suction over time (funny because it says "no loss of suction" right on the vaccum!!!!) I would not reccomend this vaccum. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: chandler

customer_reviews.title: 2 hours later - still no help.
customer_reviews.text: I’m long in the tooth and just lost 2 hours of my life stepping all over vacuum. Spent extra to get newest model . NO ONE can explain where the “step on nozzle” is —so no , it doesn’t release . No customer service — impossible ..
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum. I have had a lot of brands
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. I have had a lot of brands. this vacuum has a long cord, suckshion is amazing light weight, easy to clean the canister,and has a large sized canister. easy to put together, not a fan of the purple color. I have 3 cats it sucks up the hair amazingly. my father in law has a dyson purple not easy to use. I vacuumed with the dyson then vacuumed with my Hoover. The Hoover did better then the dyson. I was not shocked that the Hoover did a way better job. I would give it 5 stars but it’s purple. Over all very happy with the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Never will buy bagless vacuum again
customer_reviews.text: Canister is a mess to clean. The hair and other items picked up fall right out when you open canister. However, the dirt picked up is stuck in the crevices and removable pieces. Have to lay out paper, wear gloves and use wet rags, qtips and toothpicks to get out the dirt. I will never buy a bagless again. Have photos but not able to upload.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: It broke after 2 months for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Well it was a great 2 months, this vacuum was awesome. To be fair, I had to clean it out a few times, and obviously empty the canister every couple of uses but I was very happy. Then the suction shut off.... the lights still turn on and weirder still, the brushes still spin but there is no suction whatsoever. It doesn’t make a sound when the brush is turned off. Worst vacuum ever. My last one... well I had it for years and my it was my parents before that. This is exceptionally bad
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: As it happened to others, it happened to me.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, BUT, like others said, after I used it no more than a dozen times it smells hot like a diode or resistor is burning. Thought it was hair around the brush or a dirty filter, but not much hair and I cleaned the filter again and that didn't make a difference! I guess I'll be waiting for it to die. Update. Take the Hepa filter out! The hot air from the motor melted the black part of the filter, which restricted air flow, which causes the motor to over heat and then we get that odd hot burning smell.
customer_reviews.author: logic and common sense

customer_reviews.title: t's working, it is the BEST!  When it stops, it is very unnerving!  Please make restitution!
customer_reviews.text: We have a pet that sheds. This vacuum does the job! With the extra parts that come with the vacuum you are set. We used the vacuum in the whole house. But yesterday my husband was vacuuming a rug in the bathroom, all of a sudden, nothing. So he proceeded to take the vacuum back downstairs to see if he could figure out the problem. This vacuum is just DEAD! We bought it on October 22, 2018. I think it should have lasted more than eight months. Hopefully, Amazon will refund the bucks we spent, that we may buy another, or something simular. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: SJZ

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is amazing! I’m sure there are other vacuums better than this one but after using this one for the last three months, I can say that my house has MUCH less dust, fur, and debris. I had vacuumed my entire home three days before I tried this one out. When I vacuumed I accumulated an entire tank full of dirt, dust, fur, and other debris! So happy to have purchased this and very happy with the Black Friday deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kody Oakes

customer_reviews.title: but easy to remove dust bin and good suction
customer_reviews.text: As described. Shipped quickly. It is not as light as I had hoped and the handle is a little awkward, but easy to remove dust bin and good suction.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Very simple, easy to use, powerful vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It’s fantastic. It’s not too heavy to carry around with one hand, the hose is long enough to reach where you need it to, and the assembly is quick and easy. It transfers well between vinyl floors and the rug and the light is super bright to make sure you don’t miss any spots.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Got some power - But handheld attachment is run off suction.
customer_reviews.text: The unit definitely has some suction. Picks up things out of my carpet that my last shark cleaner was not picking up at all. Two issues I have is that this unit is very heavy which makes it a pain for steps. Also, the handheld upholstery and step tool is not "powered". The brush turns based off the suction of the unit so as soon as you push lightly on whatever your thing to clean, like dog hair off a couch cushion, the brush stops moving. Pretty useless really.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Really Removes Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vacuum; lightweight and easy to move from carpet to hard floor. Love the swivel head. Best of all is that it really does remove the dog hair with one swipe. Best machine I have owned over all these years.
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: Exchange and attempt warranty claim
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is horrible, I had to exchange with Amazon within first 30 days. Lasted a year and now having same problem as the first time plus an additional and Hoover customer service has taken close to 30 days to get back to me in regards to a warranty claim. Not even sure if they are going to warranty a purchased and registered item. After looking at their Facebook page, looks like the only comments on their are in regards to their horrible customer service and low quality product. I will not buy a Hoover again.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: Turns Off Unexpectedly, Won't Turn Back On. Now Dead.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum as an Xmas gift to my daughter, who lives in another state but was going to be home for Xmas, so I had it delivered to my house. Then her pregnancy kept her from returning home, so she didn't receive the gift until early February, which was unfortunately past the return-by date. By the end of February, it started to malfunction, turning off periodically and refusing to turn back on. By the end of March, it wouldn't turn on at all. This was a big gift for me, and it's frustrating that the circumstances have left me bereft of replacement options. - J
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I thought this vacuum was great when I bought it 10 months ago. Today the suction stopped working, as I was vacuuming. Now when it is in the upright position and I push the power button, only the light comes on, until I put it into the vacuuming position, then it comes on but sounds weak and is picking up nothing. I cleaned it, pulled out the very small amount of whatever that was wrapped around the brush and still not working right. I haven't even owned it for a year and return and warranty option is already expired. I guess I should have stuck with Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died under warrenty. Hoover refuses to respond to multiple contacts. BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: The power unit on this vacuum completed died 11 months into the 5 year warrenty (also paid for extended warrenty) . I emailed the Hoover customer service department and their response was, clean out the brushes and make sure its plugged in. Well of course we checked all of those things which ,I told Hoover customer service. When I responded that all of these things were fine Hoover customer service stopped all communication despite several attempts. To this day they have never responded and this was 3 months ago. This problem seems very common based on other reviews. DO NOT BUY . Hoovers customer service is the worst I've experienced. m
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this a few days but I think it is an amazing vacuum for the price. We are replacing an aging Hoover wind tunnel that has performed reasonably well. This vacuum is much quieter and the suction power is impressive. It does a great job on carpets as well as bare floors/tile. Everything works well, esp the ease of use of the extension hose and attachment. Emptying the canister is also a breeze. Plus it has a five year warranty. I could not be more pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Beffa

customer_reviews.title: Not for multiple room cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Strong suction power, bright led lights & maneuvering was better than old style uprights. My huge issue was I couldn’t vacuum our entire small 1,200 sq ft house without the motor shutting off. Couldn’t believe it & contacted Hoover. They evidently see no issue in not being able to vacuum your entire house at once. Whose got time to stagger your room cleaning over an entire weekend to keep the vacuum at a ridiculously low temperature...not me!
customer_reviews.author: Diamond H Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. We have two dogs that are constantly shedding hair. This vacuum picks up the dog hair with no problem. We recommend this to anyone with a dog hair problem.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good until the roller quit after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy at first. Then the roller brush wouldn’t reliably turn on. Sometimes if I shut the vacuum down and restarted it would come on. Today (2/wk used on a small area rug) it just wouldn’t turn on. I took it apart to trouble shoot, but there wasn’t anything obviously wrong. After putting it back together, it still won’t roll. I had to contact Hoover and am waiting for a response, but I’ve never had this happen with my Dyson I had for 13 years.
customer_reviews.author: Miserable Cow

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe the pet hair and dirt that was in my carpet. This vacuum's suction pulled out dirt that my Dirty Devil couldn't. I'm mostly pleased with this purchase, but it comes with 3 attachments and 2 storage areas on the vacuum. Not exactly an issue with the vacuum itself, but it's storage design.
customer_reviews.author: TASTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: We have been loyal Dyson owners for 10+ years and were ready for a change. Two dogs, three teens and floors that are hard to maintain. The Dyson Animal was just not cutting it. Took a chance on the Hoover and we are pretty happy. Easy maneuverability, very good suction, easy to dump bin. Only complaints: no retractable cord (it is a long one), bin max line is low--we fill it up very quickly and it is heavy. For the price tag, it was worth it. It does a solid job and I feel like it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl119

customer_reviews.title: Crazy powerful, with just a couple cons
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little heavy, my arm got a little tired pushing it around, and I am stronger than the average woman. It’s definitely top heavy so when you use the hose to clean anything it tops over. It also doesn’t work on hard floors, which is kinda a big con for me but that’s where the cone end. This vacuum is incredibly powerful, it pulls pet hair and dust I didn’t even know was in my carpet, out. I am extremely happy with this purchase and would recommend to anyone with pets!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Clukey

customer_reviews.title: Great price, quality vacuum, best for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Have lived in this house for 6 years and stubbornly refused to buy a vacuum for our den since “we’re gonna get rid of the carpet eventually”. With 4 pets the embedded hair in den carpet was unimaginable. This vacuum went over it like nothing and the carpet is clean clean. I was amazed and I really wish I had taken a before and after picture. It worked so quickly. It’s a bulky machine so it’s not easy to transport throughout the house, but I wanted a quality machine for a good price and I assume the bulk is a byproduct of the high suction power. Anyway, best vacuum I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: cleans up fine , behind me and my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Have a short haired terrier and I have long hair. We live on the red dirt of SC. In a large travel trailer. I always thought the eureka I was using did a pretty good job. Filled my new vacume up 1 1/2 times. Eureka ! Was not doing such a good job. Short dog hair has a way of working it's way into carpet and fabric. This machine machine and it's components clean it up quick.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for several months now, and I absolutely love it. It picks up just as well as my old Electrolux canister vacuum but doesn't kill my back lugging it up and down stairs in a split level home. Maneuverability is great and it's super easy to empty and clean. The canister is huge, too. Two mild flaws only: 1) I wish the cord was retractable, and 2) the hose attachment with the spinning brush doesn't work too well, because it only spins from the force of the air being pulled through it. I don't find myself using that attachment much anymore. Otherwise, this is an amazing product for the price. I'll only buy Hoovers from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow! I went from a 10 year old Bissell vacuum bought at Target to this Hoover. I did not know a vacuum could be so powerful, easy to maneuver, easy to clean and just overall have an incredible cleaning experience! I did not know my carpets were so nice until I used this little gem. I'm a huge fan now and will never go back to cheap vacuums! I have 2 big dogs who shed like crazy and bring tons of dirt into my house. This vacuum cleaner my house exceptionally well!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Hoover will not stand behind their products
customer_reviews.text: Hoover will not stand behind their products. Even with a busy work schedule I’ve got a problem with the handle where it will not stay attached in place anymore and unless they can actually have you standing by the vacuum, which is ridiculous. I had higher definition photographs of the unit and I also had a video of how the handle is turning and they would not except that I had to be there in person. If I had my choices I will return the vacuum and get a full refund
customer_reviews.author: ICEMAN

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vacuum I've ever owned! I have a Border Collie/Husky mix that sheds a ton so our carpet is constantly covered in hair!! This vacuum picks up everything, including the hairs that get embedded in the carpet and are usually more difficult to pull out. I love the extra tools it comes with so you can remove hair from furniture and reach up into high places too. It's not too loud and super easy to empty the hair and clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for a toddler's household. Yes!
customer_reviews.text: So we've had this for a month. My 14m son leaves food everywhere and I have unpacked so much stuff from two storage units, and our two cats are adept at shedding litter and hair. This thing is a powerhouse. I can clean the high chair, floor mats, and carpet in no time. The baby loves this thing, my floors love it, I love it! No need to empty it every day either. The best! I bought the carpet cleaner a few months ago and both of these buys have made me a happy mama.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Q. Contrary

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up hair, fur and cat litter
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great if you have pets! I have a long haired cat and between her fur and cat litter on the floor, this vacuum takes care of it all seamlessly. My vacuum in the past could not handle it all and quickly broke down. I love the lights on this vacuum, it makes it easy to see all the hair and litter on the floor. It’s so easy to maneuver too.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for a while
customer_reviews.text: The brush roller quit working. The light comes on but the brush roller does not turn.
customer_reviews.author: CMYKX2

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets
customer_reviews.text: Have had this vacuum since January and it’s now April. We have two dogs and and four cats so we have a lot of hair to pick up. I love the extra attachment that allows me to vacuum the couch. I can vacuum the hardwood just fine and the headlights make the hair reflect so I’m sure I’m getting it all. The XL dirt chamber let’s me empty less frequently so that’s also helpful. The only downside to this vacuum is that it’s top heavy so if you’re using the hose by it’s self and over reach with it it will fall over. Other than that it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to push
customer_reviews.text: If you've owned an older self-propelled WindTunnel by Hoover, you will be disappointed with this model. Although it is lighter than the old version, it is much harder to push. It also has a high center of gravity, so if you are not a tall person, it puts a lot of pressure on your shoulder. It also doesn't pick up as well as the old model. The only improved feature on this model is that you an switch from carpet to hard surface vacuuming without bending over, since the switch has been moved up.
customer_reviews.author: tm

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I got by for years with a $60 Bissell vacuum until we finally decided to "splurge" and order something decent. I was amazed at what this vacuum picked up. After going over the carpet with this, it looked like brand new carpet! Disgusting seeing how much stuff the Bissell missed. It's also super easy to use and steer, and the debris container is super easy to clean out. This vacuum was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: The attachments have very little suction and actually work like an afterthought
customer_reviews.text: The machine is not user friendly. The attachments have very little suction and actually work like an afterthought. The suction is good, when you can figure out how to turn the machine on.
customer_reviews.author: Dina Glardon

customer_reviews.title: Greatly improved swivel model Vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this updated model (have an older one). The light is a good addition. I love what they have done to the brush so that animal hair does not get tangled up. With three long haired babies in my house, I have to vacuum frequently and now don't have to worry about taking the vacuum apart to get hair untangled. This model is heavier to use and weighs 8 pounds more than my old one. Overall it is a much better machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because like a lot of reviews say, it came in and you could let it had been used before. The canister, filters and other main visible parts looked new. I got the extended warranty bc I seen a few issues with it breaking and needing to get a replacement as well as the issues with seeming to get a used product. I have to say the vacuum is great! Does a really good job. Only had it for 3 days but seems to be solid. A little noisy, kinda wondering if a review I read will provide accurate, if it does I have the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good machine for the price
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy, but brush works well on carpet and adequately on hardwood and tile floors with plenty of suction. It's not easy to use the hose feature because the wand attachment is so big and bulky. Very clumsy to use. We use it mainly for carpeted areas because our smaller Shark Ninja works better on bare floors.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S.

customer_reviews.title: Not storage friendly
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, it even took powder form under carpet that, I guess was sitting there for a while as I sometimes use baking soda. Not as easy to clean, I still haven't figured out how to take apart the tunnel to clean it. The cord is long but to storage it, the vacuum has to be fully assembled, I like to put the handle apart to storage but if I do so, I'm not able to keep the cord on place which is the only thing I didn't like. If you don't have a storage problem don't worry. The vacuum is a little heavier that other Hoover I have but for the suction it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Luna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that sheds a lot of hair constantly, and this vacuum does an excellent job removing the hair from my furniture and carpet. Does not clog hose and does not lose suction. Especially like the suction strength control and being able to turn the rollers off to vacuum floors with no carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Not self propelled.
customer_reviews.text: The description on Amazon is somewhat misleading: Power Drive suggests it is "self propelled", and an independent review I found includes it in a list of "self propelled" vacuums. IT IS DEFINITELY NOT SELF PROPELLED. Other than the above, it has very good suction, is fairly easy to push and easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID L. RUFF

customer_reviews.title: does great job  BUT
customer_reviews.text: when something breaks try to find it on Ebay. Hoover does not replace parts except for a very few. Have bought two wands to replace the original and they have broke also at one small piece where it locks into the shaft. Dirt canister broke when wife was cleaning it so had to buy one of those off Ebay. Don't buy. Hoover use to be good but this was a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: When I was making a decision to buy a vacuum, I thought back to my childhood. We had a Hoover in the 70’s that lasted well into the 90’s with some maintenance needed for usual use but our vacuum never just stopped working. The floor lights come on only. I’ve had this Hoover for less than 2 years and take very good care of it. I have always thought of a Hoover as durable and long lasting vacuum. This is very sad!
customer_reviews.author: lisa ann

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful vacuum. I love it. Just make sure you clean it out and you should have no problems. I used this on my carpets for the first time and you would not believe what it pulled out of the carpet’s. Love this vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Work's great but then just stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: After three weeks of using the vacuum, it lost it's power and ability to suction dirt. I cleaned the vacuum weekly to make sure the passageways were clear but this did not solve the problem. Instead of cleaning it just now pushes the dirt around. Had to go out and buy a different vacuum and can't get my money back for this one. Don't waste your money! Thanks Hoover...
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed after several uses only
customer_reviews.text: Was great at first by use three you can tell less suction happening. I have kept clean. Filter gets dirty instantly and it is rinse to clean. But it takes days to dry unless you place outside in heat then will dry in 24 hrs ish. Disappointed already when so so excited right out of box
customer_reviews.author: Let Them Live Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Lost suction after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum was working great until 2 days ago. Suddenly, I have no suction. Hoover's customer service told me suction was not covered under warranty. I don't know what good the warranty is if it doesn't cover suction. This doesn't suck!
customer_reviews.author: william f hennigan

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is worth every penny. This is the best I've ever owned. I love all the tools and attachments. The first time I used it I was shocked of the amount of dust it collected. And after owning it for almost a year I'm still shocked that it hasn't reduced it sucking power. I have pets and this vacuum is a must. Amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome choice!
customer_reviews.text: This brand speaks for itself, its awesome. And this product specifically is great. First time I used it a twin of my dog came out of the carpet (thats how much fur of his was stuck in it). The cord is long and goes through the whole apartment. Also, once you get how it works, its easy to make it stand up and bend.
customer_reviews.author: Eduarda Mattos

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it’s a lemon, maybe they’re all just trash.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this vacuum on March 3. Used it twice weekly on a small carpeted area (100sq/ft). Vacuum worked well enough picking up after my Saint Bernard. Vacuum was thoroughly cleaned and emptied after each use, on its tenth use it began to lose suction before the motor completely stopped, but hey the headlights still work. As an individual displaced from work due to COVID 19, I can not afford to replace a month old $150 vacuum. My attempts at reaching out to Hoover have fallen on deaf ears. Maybe I got a lemon, but next time I won’t be getting a Hoover.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a vacuum where the rotating bar stopped when on floors. This one was the only model that had that. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Elyse M. Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: how easy this vacuum cleaner was too installed
customer_reviews.text: i LIKE HOOVER PRODUCTS AND HAVE BOUGHT A LOT THRU THE YEARS. This vacuum cleaner is super and does a great job clean the tile and carpet that I have. Plus has a long hose that i like alot. The part i did not like that it has no dial too change the setting from tile too carpet but it is still a great product.And thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Shimozaki

customer_reviews.title: Great power
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job picking up pet hair, rather heavy machine, but it does raise the pile in the carpet better than any machine I have had. So if you are looking for a machine that is easy to use this is not the one to choose since it is heavy.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum I've ever owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: Previously I had a Dyson vacuum, over priced and did not last long. But this Hoover vacuum is excellent! This vacuum does have a bit of heft to it, but has excellent maneuverability. The light on the head is bright, you'll see exactly what you're trying to pick up. This vacuum picks up better than any I've had previously. I have 4 animals, the furniture attachment is fantastic. And it's easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: NReed

customer_reviews.title: Works great if it works
customer_reviews.text: This vaccum WAS great, for the ammount of times i was able to use it. First time stopped workong in a month, second time, a month and a half now, both having the same issues. Going to call support and see if im missing something, but the vacuum starts, then after 2 seconds, the roller stops spinning. If its user error, ill update to reflect, but for now beware.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Helped me save the day
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it daily for a month now. My daughter just had a baby and has two large labs. One sheds like crazy and her previous pet vacuum worthless. I purchased this for her while visiting and she said it’s norhing short of amazinggggg!
customer_reviews.author: ghutch

customer_reviews.title: Maneuverability
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this vacuum. We have 3 cats and it is a breeze to use and move around and picks up so much fur - it's so much better than my old vacuum. The cord is very long, as well, so I can finish most of the apartment and only have to switch power plugs once. It's maneuverability is one of my favorite things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. If it clogs (..thanks long hair) don't expect to unclog it easily. Then when you go to remove the clog, bits and pieces just easily break off. Don't get me started on cleaning the filters. You are better off buying the $20 special from big box store. Never buying anything Hoover again
customer_reviews.author: Juergenssmokehouse

customer_reviews.title: This great vacuum cleaner, but
customer_reviews.text: This great vacuum cleaner, but it is slightly second the Electrolux vacuum cleaner. One con, it hits and damages to moulding on the floor. It is too tough on soft wood. Other than that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin A. Holder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My carpets are like new! My dog is a very fluffy shepherd and with summer time her shedding is crazy... and her hair gets everywhere. The forward motion is excellent with maneuvering however I felt like I was doing a shoulder workout pulling motion. I don’t mind it because the end result got everything up! The hose was great too getting corners the hair accumulates! So happy with this product I had to write something next day! This is my first and only review I’ve ever written too!
customer_reviews.author: Kissiah Timm

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked pretty well for the first 2 months and then It stopped working. The lights are on indicating the power source is working but the motor is not engaged and won’t work
customer_reviews.author: Alex tuttle

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR MANOUVERABILITY & TOO HEAVY
customer_reviews.text: Item top heavy and not enough weight at the bottom to create enough suction - VERY heavy and cumbersome to maneuver around despite the swivel feature. I love the lights!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pierre De Klerk

customer_reviews.title: pretty good vacuum
customer_reviews.text: All vacuums suck! LOL. This one works well, although don't expect all the accessories to stay clipped in place. they knock off easily and you'll constantly be picking them up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: I. Like the ability to turn off the brush when not nedded
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power and much lighter then my old self propelled bag machine. The easy detachabe wand is also a big improvement too.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L Wayland

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum A+ Tools D
customer_reviews.text: The pet tool clogged in the middle of the first use. Not very tough on pet hair as far as tools provided goes. I'm very happy with the floor suction
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AFTER 3RD USE.
customer_reviews.text: Third time using it the brush got jammed. I turned it off as soon as it started spinning, pulled hair off, and tried to run it again and the brush will no longer spin. We are assuming it messed the motor up. The vacuum is advertised to prevent this, and it quickly messed up on 3rd use. I feel like it was a huge waste of 150.00. And now I can't get anyone to contact me about returning for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Cami

customer_reviews.title: Great Suction
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has great suction and handles pet hair fairly easily. I empty the canister often to avoid any clogs , but it is larger than most. It does not fit under furniture well, but the wand and attachments are more than adequate for hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Brush roller 2 short. Doesnt touch carpet !!
customer_reviews.text: Hoover Swivel bagless Pet Hair w/adjustable Suction. Not real thrilled w/carpet brush. Hav normal carpet. Bristles dont even touch my carpet, suck anything up, even after adjusting suction level. ( my broom moves more hair !!!) Have 2 use the bare floor option for my carpet, which works really well, plenty of suction ! Guess i wound up payig for 1/2 a vacuum that works. Reall dissapointed in this Hoover product. Buyer beware ! D. Trevillyan
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Trevillyan

customer_reviews.title: Great price good item
customer_reviews.text: Just as i expected have only had it couple weeks . We have 2 dogs that shed a lot and a bird that always throws seed Kernels on the floor. It picks up great have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. It was a gift to my parents and they are thrilled with it. It is lightweight for them and they use it often. I would get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best Vacuum I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: So far no dislikes, suction is fantastic, even on the hose attachment which was not the case with my old Hoover wind tunnel... it empties out far easier too! Very sturdy and I love the low profile and smaller head to fit underneath and in between furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Navarette

customer_reviews.title: really good
customer_reviews.text: 12x15 master bedroom, vacuumed at least once a week with old vacuum and thought it did a pretty good job, I had to empty canister 4 times (not a small canister) with this vacuum the first time I used it and that was just 1 room. So used to being disappointed with products, felt I had to write a review about how good this product is and at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: t2k

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for a few days... but, wow! It’s doing a great job! I had a Dyson for years and loved it until it no longer worked... this vacuum is really amazing.
customer_reviews.author: B Cain

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with my long haired cat fur
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with my long haired cat fur. I like that it swivels, makes thing easier going around furniture and corners. Only complaint, on the box it said there was a bag to put the attachments that did not go on the vacuum, did not receive the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Suction is fantastic and adjustable. Only wish is that the cord was retractable, but overall the best vacuum I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Yourren

customer_reviews.title: It sucks in a good way!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have a black cat and a medium-large black dog... And beige carpet... We thought our old vacuum did a decent job. When this showed up, my wife vacuumed with the old vac, then went back over the same area with this. We were both shocked at the amount of pet hair that showed up in the canister, even more surprised at the amount of dirt! It really does get the deep down stuff that you don't realize is even there.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a great vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase!! I was disgusted after a few minutes of vacuuming to discover how little my old vacuum picked up. It's a little heavy and loud, but it works like a dream! The cord is a good length, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with great suction
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum for the price. I had a dyson and this one is a great replacement. I did have trouble getting use to the swivel, but after a couple of times, no problem. Attachments are easy to attach and bag is a one-handed empty. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: melbar

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Not made to last! Overheats, gets clogged before dirt gets into canister and cannot vacuum entire home before it overheats and stops running.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not found anthing i dislike, it is extremely easy to assemble, easy to use and does an excellent job!!! You just have to make sure that the brush is on that was an operator error but I really enjoy it it's easy to maneuver it's not heavy and I love all the attachments I also love it it has a handle that makes it easy to carry when you are using those attachments, I am extremely happy with it thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum did not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product used and that was probably the worst decision ever. It worked but only the top portion i.e the hose. The main lower part of the vacuum had VERY minimal suction. I did not realize how long it had been since I purchased/received the item and now I stuck with it. -_- This is the THIRD time I've ordered something from amazon & the product was either NOT what I ordered or it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully my hose attachment from my previous vacuum fit to ...
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully my hose attachment from my previous vacuum fit to make it longer. Getting down close to do all of the baseboards was a hassle and was hurting my back after a while. Otherwise it's working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is not very good at all. Gets surface dirt but I feel like it doesn't get the deep-down dirt.
customer_reviews.author: MLKeys

customer_reviews.title: It was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I am not willing to pay high dollar for vacuum cleaner. This vacuum was the right price for me. It was super easy to put together. I was amazed at how much this actually picked up from my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: True test of time
customer_reviews.text: Hoover is truly an amazing brand, I still have my vacuum I bought in 2010 amd it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Tony2Toes

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My dog is a lab Dane mix and sheds horribly twice a year. This vacuum can keep up with the hair on hardwood, tile, linoleum and carpet.
customer_reviews.author: ROSE TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and then didn't unbox it for a few months. It broke the first time I used it, which was outside of the service window. So now I have a nice big paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: John R Wildt

product_meta.title: Hoover UH74210PC Power Drive Bagless Multi Floor Upright Vacuum Cleaner with Swivel Steering, for Pet Hair, Purple
product_meta.description: Hoover PowerDrivePet Upright Vacuum UH74210PC is perfect for homes with pets. It combines the power and suction you trust to deliver a deeper clean. Its swivel steering design effortlessly maneuvers around furniture and into tight spaces with ease, while the new Advanced Action Brush Roll is engineered to tackle deep-down embedded dirt and reduce hair wrap. The ON/OFF brush roll feature allows you to transition from carpet to hard floor with the touch of a button to optimize pet hair removal on all floor types. Turn the brush roll ON for deep cleaning on carpets and OFF to prevent scatter of debris on hard floors. With 13 ft. of cleaning reach, multipurpose pet tools, and an extra-large capacity dirt cup, you’ll be able to achieve a whole home clean so you can love your pets, not the hair they leave behind. For over 100 years, Hoover has reimagined the way we clean, delivering a complete collection of trusted, innovative and effective solutions designed to make cleaning easier for active families so they can get back to what matters most.
feature_bullets: Swivel steering - This upright vacuum cleaner effortlessly maneuvers around furniture and into tight spaces with ease
Advanced action brush roll - Engineered to tackle deep down embedded dirt and reduce hair wrap
Multi-floor cleaning - Turn the brush roll “On” for optimal cleaning on carpet and OFF to prevent scattering of debris on hard floor
XL capacity dirt cup - A large easy empty dirt cup means less emptying for a more convenient clean. Motor Amps- 11 Amps. Motor volts- 120 volts
Multipurpose pet tools - Reach and remove stubborn dirt and pet hair with the tools you need for a whole home clean.
Quick release cleaning wand - Easily transition from carpet to above floor cleaning with uninterrupted suction.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars909 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Upright Vacuum^Crevice Tool^Dusting Brush^Pet Turbo Tool
